error.mobileError: Error: Your mobile phone number is not valid.
error.mobileRepeatError: Error: Your mobile phone number was repeated incorrectly.
error.emailError: Error: Your e-mail address is not valid.
error.emailRepeatError: Error: You repeated the e-mail address incorrectly.
error.allContactInfoIsRemoved: To complete the registration, you must enter either a mobile number, e-mail or both.

info.kontaktinfo: The information below is stored in a common contact register that the state and municipality will use when they contact you. Read more
info.manglendeInformasjon:
The information below is stored in a common contact register that the state and municipality will use when they contact you. Read more

You can choose to proceed without entering contact information.
info.manglendeEpostVarsel: You have not registered an email address. The e-mail address is used as a notification address when the state or municipality is to notify you that they have sent you important letters and decisions online. If you use MinID to log in to public services online, the e-mail address can also be used to send you one-time codes, if you have forgotten your password.
info.manglendeEpostLabel: You should use your private e-mail address to ensure that no one else has access to your personal ID.
info.manglendeMobilVarsel: You have not registered a mobile number. The mobile number is used as a notification address when the state or municipality is to notify you that they have sent you important letters and decisions online. If you use MinID to log in to public services online, the mobile number can also be used to send you one-time codes via SMS.
info.manglendeMobilLabel: If you have a foreign number, remember to enter the country code ( +46 or 0046 for Sweden).
info.digitalPostkasseTekst: You can now receive letters from the state and municipality digitally in a secure mailbox online. Do you want more information?
info.sletteMobilVarsel: If you remove the mobile number, you can no longer receive one-time codes from MinID or communication from the state and municipality to your mobile.

notfound.title: Not Found
notfound.text: The page you tried to access does not exist.

misc.congratulations: Your MinID is now ready for use.

validation.password: Must be at least 8 characters, including digits and letters.

html5.badInput: The specified value cannot be parsed, or is out of range.
html5.rangeOverflow: The specified value is too large.
html5.rangeUnderflow: The specified value is too small.
html5.typeMismatch: The specified value does not match type.
